summary: I HAVE REPLACED 2 INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKETS ON MY 1996 PONTIAC GRAND AM . NOW MY 2000 GRAND AM GT GASKET IS LEAKING, AND PONTIAC CONFIRMED THIS AND WILL NOT REPAIR IT. THERE IS A MEMO ABOUT THIS IF YOU CAN GET A COPY OF IT. THIS CAN OCCUR FROM ABOUT 30,000 MILES ON. THIS ALSO AFFECTS CHEVROLET WITH THE SAME ENGINE.  *JB
